name: Spirit Break
description: You attack with so much force it breaks the target's spirit. Make a melee attack against a target, dealing 2d8 + MOVE fairy damage on a hit. The target has disadvantage on its next attack.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d10 at level 5, 3d10 at level 10, and 4d12 at level 17.
